original_body_lines: Four office trains scheduled to operate on Tuesday morning (25 July), have been cancelled, the Railway Engine Drivers’ Union reported.
Chairman of the union, Chandana Lal, explained that the four trains were cancelled after the assistant engine drivers failed to report to work this morning.
Thus, office trains plying from Colombo Fort to Rambukkana Polgahawela and Gampaha were cancelled, severely inconveniencing passengers.
